org.mmtk.plan

Class SimpleMutator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mmtk.plan.MutatorContext
      • org.mmtk.plan.SimpleMutator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConcurrentMutator, StopTheWorldMutator

    public abstract class SimpleMutator
extends MutatorContext
    This class (and its sub-classes) implement per-mutator thread behavior and state.

    MMTk assumes that the VM instantiates instances of MutatorContext in thread local storage (TLS) for each application thread. Accesses to this state are therefore assumed to be low-cost during mutator time.

    See Also:
    MutatorContext

    • Method Detail

      • collectionPhase

        public void collectionPhase(short phaseId,
                            boolean primary)
        Perform a per-mutator collection phase. This is executed by one collector thread on behalf of a mutator thread.
        Specified by:
        collectionPhase in class MutatorContext
        Parameters:
        phaseId - The unique phase identifier
        primary - Should this thread be used to execute any single-threaded local operations?
